text: Ara smarana karuna--- yakhana nabi tara stridera ekajanake gopane ekati katha balechilena. Atahpara yakhana se ta an'yake janiye diyechila ebam allaha nabira kache ta prakasa kare dilena, takhana nabi e bisaye kichu byakta karalena ebam kichu eriye gelena [1]. Atahpara yakhana nabi ta tara se strike janalena takhana se balala, ‘ke apanake eta janalo?’ Nabi balalena, ‘amake janiyechena tini, yini sarbajna, samyaka abahita.’
